mapper.select: SELECT (@rowNo:=@rowNo + 1) AS rowNo, employeeNo, happendDate, costClassificationCode, dueDate, detailedNameOrLine, stationCode, originCode, transportationCode, destinationCode, cost, remark, roundCode, CONVERT (costFile USING utf8)costFile, updateTime, createTime, updateUser FROM T020CostInfo ,(SELECT @rowNo:=0) AS rowNo WHERE happendDate <= date_format(date_add(NOW(), interval 2 MONTH) ,'%Y%m%d') AND employeeNo = #{employeeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T020CostInfo( employeeNo, happendDate, costClassificationCode, dueDate, detailedNameOrLine, stationCode, originCode, transportationCode, destinationCode, cost, remark, roundCode, costFile, updateTime, createTime, updateUser) VALUE( #{employeeNo}, #{happendDate}, #{costClassificationCode}, #{dueDate}, #{detailedNameOrLine}, #{stationCode}, #{originCode}, #{transportationCode}, #{destinationCode}, #{cost}, #{remark}, #{roundCode}, #{costFile}, NOW(), NOW(), #{employeeName})
mapper.update: UPDATE T020CostInfo SET happendDate = #{happendDate}, costClassificationCode = #{costClassificationCode}, dueDate = #{dueDate}, detailedNameOrLine = #{detailedNameOrLine}, stationCode = #{stationCode}, originCode = #{originCode}, transportationCode = #{transportationCode}, destinationCode = #{destinationCode}, cost = #{cost}, remark = #{remark}, roundCode = #{roundCode}, costFile = #{costFile}, updateTime =now(), createTime =now(), updateUser = #{employeeName} WHERE employeeNo = #{employeeNo} and happendDate = #{oldHappendDate}, and costClassificationCode = #{oldCostClassificationCode}
